history.proof: intros a [p [H1 [H2 H3]]]. intro. apply H2. pose proof (prime_rel_prime p a) as H4. qsimpl time: 1. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: pose proof (prime_rel_prime p a) as H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, p : nat H1 : p <> a H2 : is_prime p H3 : divides a p H : is_prime a H4 : is_prime p -> ~ rel_prime a p -> divides a p Unable to unify "divides a p" with "p = 1".

ctx: pose proof (prime_rel_prime p a) as H4.
pose proof (prime_rel_prime p a) as H4.
pose proof (prime_rel_prime p a) as H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment p, x : nat H1 : p = p * x -> False H5 : forall d : nat, divides (p * x) d -> d = 1 \\/ d = p * x H4 : p * x = 1 -> False H0 : (rel_prime (p * x) p -> False) -> divides (p * x) p H : p = 1 -> False H3 : forall d : nat, divides p d -> d = 1 \\/ d = p Unable to unify "False" with "p = 1".

ctx: pose proof (prime_rel_prime p a) as H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment p, x : nat H1 : p = p * x -> False H5 : forall d : nat, divides (p * x) d -> d = 1 \\/ d = p * x H4 : p * x = 1 -> False H0 : (rel_prime (p * x) p -> False) -> divides (p * x) p H : p = 1 -> False H3 : forall d : nat, divides p d -> d = 1 \\/ d = p Unable to unify "?M1944 = 1 \\/ ?M1944 = p" with "p = 1".

original: intros a [p [H1 [H2 H3]]]. intro. apply H2. pose proof (prime_rel_prime p a) as H4. apply H4; auto. intros H5. apply H1. apply H3. exists 1. rewrite mult_1_r. split; auto. rewrite <- H5. split; auto. apply divides_refl.
